entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a character who has guests and is lazy. He says 'As you have clearly realised, Wormtail, we have guests,' which indicates that he knows Wormtail is aware of the presence of Narcissa and Bellatrix.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is introduced as a character who has small, watery eyes, a pointed nose, and an unpleasant simper. He wears a bright silver glove on his right hand.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is mentioned as one of the guests who has arrived at Snape's place.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as one of the guests who has arrived at Snape's place.

relationships.description: Snape says 'Really? I was under the impression that the Dark Lord placed you here to assist me.' which indicates that Snape believes Wormtail is his assistant.
